BATwinsMod:MomoisGameConsole.NAME: Momoi's Game Console
BATwinsMod:MomoisGameConsole.FLAVOR: It's already broken, and the club's funds can't afford a new one! - Momoi
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each battle, gain [batwinsmod:momoiorbicon] . Add a random #yBATwinsMod:MomoiCard from your draw pile to your hand.

BATwinsMod:MidorisGameConsole.NAME: Midori's Game Console
BATwinsMod:MidorisGameConsole.FLAVOR: Finding it is great! I need to check the game saves right away. - Midori
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each battle, gain [batwinsmod:midoriorbicon] . Add a random #yBATwinsMod:MidoriCard from your draw pile to your hand.

BATwinsMod:AncientGameCartridges.NAME: Ancient Game Cartridges
BATwinsMod:AncientGameCartridges.FLAVOR: A worn-out game cartridge, no longer readable, barely showing the title 'S*ay *he s**re'.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each battle, play a random #bPower from your draw pile.

BATwinsMod:ByProving.NAME: By Proving
BATwinsMod:ByProving.FLAVOR: A brand new medal that reads 'Novice Level Passed!' --%s.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play #b%s, deal the same damage to a random enemy.
When you play #b%s, draw 1 cards.
When you play #b%s, add a copy to your discard pile.
Different card types have different effects
A brand new medal that reads 'Novice Level Passed!' --%s.

BATwinsMod:GameMagazine.NAME: Game Magazine
BATwinsMod:GameMagazine.FLAVOR: A game magazine given as a bonus for purchasing a game, unfortunately, it doesn't contain any information about this game.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each battle, add 1 #yBATwinsMod:Exchange to your hand.

BATwinsMod:GameGuide.NAME: Game Guide
BATwinsMod:GameGuide.FLAVOR: It says you just need to drag the cards to play them!
DESCRIPTIONS: Replace #yGame #yMagazine .At the start of each turn, add #b1 #yBATwinsMod:Exchange with #yEthereal and #yExhaust to your hand.

BATwinsMod:FoldingShield.NAME: Folding Shield
BATwinsMod:FoldingShield.FLAVOR: A shield frequently used by Yuuka.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b%d times the number of cards in your hand as Block.

BATwinsMod:Headband.NAME: Maid Headband
BATwinsMod:Headband.FLAVOR: Would there have been maids in such a strange place before?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain [batwinsmod:momoiorbicon] or [batwinsmod:midoriorbicon] . Choose upon pickup.

BATwinsMod:SpecialAmmunition.NAME: Special Ammunition
BATwinsMod:SpecialAmmunition.FLAVOR: This is the latest product from the engineering department.
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase the damage of Bullet cards by #b3.

BATwinsMod:SwordOfLight.NAME: Sword of Light
BATwinsMod:SwordOfLight.FLAVOR: It's hard to even hold it, how are we supposed to use it?
DESCRIPTIONS: After playing #b%d cards in a battle, deal #b%d damage to all enemies.

BATwinsMod:NekoHowitzer.NAME: Nyan's Dash
BATwinsMod:NekoHowitzer.FLAVOR: Yuzu's weapon, can fire grenades from a distance
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, apply #b%d stacks of Burn to a random enemy. Has a #b1%% chance to double the Burn stacks on that enemy.

BATwinsMod:FitnessRing.NAME: Fitness Ring
BATwinsMod:FitnessRing.FLAVOR: Always enthusiastic for the first three minutes.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first card drawn in the first turn of battle is upgraded for the rest of the battle.

BATwinsMod:Broom.NAME: Broom
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b3 turns, add #b1 card from the discard pile to your hand.

BATwinsMod:MaidAttire.NAME: Maid Attire
BATwinsMod:MaidAttire.FLAVOR: Everyone has a little fetish, don't they? - Shopkeeper
DESCRIPTIONS: If you have played cards with costs 0, 1, 2, and 3 this turn, gain 1 stack of Intangible.

BATwinsMod:UnknownObject.NAME: 不明物体
BATwinsMod:UnknownObject.FLAVOR: 黑客部破解了游戏，但似乎没有完全破解。
DESCRIPTIONS: 随机遗物效果，每回合会改变。

BATwinsMod:RubiksCube.NAME: Rubik's Cube
BATwinsMod:RubiksCube.FLAVOR: "The one who solves the Rubik's Cube is the true millennium person!"
DESCRIPTIONS: After playing cards in synergy 2 times, draw 1 card.

BATwinsMod:RetroGame.NAME: Pixel Console
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw #b2 additional cards each turn. Cards drawn become either #ybatwinsmod:MomoiCard or #ybatwinsmod:MidoriCard .

BATwinsMod:BookOfProhibitions.NAME: Book of Prohibitions
DESCRIPTIONS: After cards deal damage for the #y1st time each turn, heal for #y1/3 of the damage not blocked.

BATwinsMod:LearningMaterial.NAME: Basic Learning Materials
DESCRIPTIONS: When upgrading at a campfire, if you upgrade a common or basic card, randomly upgrade 1 additional common or basic card.
